text: Traum Academy is situated at Kadavanthra Junction in Ernakulam district. Traum Academy offers foreign language courses for all age group. It has been functioning to promote German and French languages in Kerala. ==References== ==External links== * Category:Schools of French as a second or foreign language Category:German-language schools Category:Language education in India Category:Schools in Ernakulam district
title: Traum Academy for German & French languages
